mapper.select: SELECT p.*,(select zwmc from BO_INDUSTRY_P where zt='有效' and dm=p.HYDM) hymc, (select zwmc from BO_INDUSTRY_S where zt='有效' and bindid=(select bindid from BO_INDUSTRY_P where dm=p.HYDM) and dm=p.HYXLDM) hyxlmc, (select zwmc from bo_cyts_baseinfo where dl='单位客户' and lx='单位性质' and zt='有效' and dm = p.DWXZDM) dwxzmc FROM BO_CRM_CLIENTBUS_P p WHERE bindid = #{0}

OZCZB1 = #{ozczb1,jdbcType=OTHER},
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=OTHER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE BO_CRM_CLIENTBUS_P set BMZJZH=#{bmzjzh}, BMZJXM=#{bmzjxm},FWBMSSGSMC=#{fwbmssgsmc},FWBMSSGSDM=#{fwbmssgsdm} ,DKHZJZH=#{dkhzjzh},DKHZJXM=#{dkhzjxm} WHERE ID=#{id}
UPDATE BO_CRM_CLIENTBUS_P set JTWLKH=#{jtwlkh} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select KHBH from BO_CRM_CLIENTBUS_P where KHBH like 'B%' and length(KHBH)=#{cd} group by KHBH order by KHBH
mapper.update: UPDATE BO_CRM_CLIENTBUS_P set KHBH=#{khbh}, flag=#{flag} WHERE BINDID=#{bindid}
UPDATE BO_CRM_CLIENTBUS_P set FWBMMC=#{fwbmmc},FWBMID=#{fwbmid} WHERE bindid=#{bindid}
UPDATE BO_CRM_CLIENTBUS_P set KHJLXM=#{khjlxm},KHJLZH=#{khjlzh} WHERE bindid=#{bindid}
mapper.select: select s.uuid UUID from sys_business_metadata p join sys_business_metadata_map s on p.id = s.metadata_id where s.field_name = #{fieldName} and p.entity_name = #{tableName}
